actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."user" SET
		"phone_number" = '{{update_form.fieldState.phone_number.isVisible ? update_form.formData.phone_number : update_form.sourceData.phone_number}}',
		"email_address" = '{{update_form.fieldState.email_address.isVisible ? update_form.formData.email_address : update_form.sourceData.email_address}}',
    "date_of_birth" = '{{update_form.fieldState.date_of_birth.isVisible ? update_form.formData.date_of_birth : update_form.sourceData.date_of_birth}}',
		"anniversary_date" = '{{update_form.fieldState.anniversary_date.isVisible ? update_form.formData.anniversary_date : update_form.sourceData.anniversary_date}}'
WHERE "user_id" = {{data_table.selectedRow.user_id}};
